page.title: 17EDUCATION.
page.content: The state schools in this area are {Reydon Infants, Southwold Primary, {Reydon High.}Private schools are {Eversley House, St George's and St {Felix.}This area is unlike most of Suffolk: it does not have a primary, middle and secondary school system because it has a small population. Pupils go from Reydon Infants to Southwold Primary and then into Reydon High. Sixth formers go to Beccles or Lowestoft. Children follow basic subjects at primary school. Reydon High has only {300}pupils{11_16}but it offers a wide variety of subjects at 'O'level, 16+ and C.S.E. St Felix is a boarding_ school with some day_girls.There are 450 pupils and they study 'O'levels, C.S.E. and 'A'levels.
